abstract: Advocacy group Humane Borders announces that six of eight water stations it had set up for migrants crossing illegally into country from Mexico through Sonoran Desert have been vandalized.

headline.print_headline: Arizona: Vandals Damage Water Stations for Migrants
headline.main: Arizona: Vandals Damage Water Stations for Migrants

snippet: Humane Borders says the water stations help keep migrants who are crossing illegally from Mexico through the southern Arizona desert alive.
lead_paragraph: Humane Borders says the water stations help keep migrants who are crossing illegally from Mexico through the southern Arizona desert alive.
